description: This file defines the AccountScreen widget for a Flutter app, which manages user account display and logout functionality, and handles navigation to a login screen if the user is not authenticated.

classes.name: AccountScreen
classes.description: A Flutter widget that presents account info and provides logout functionality, redirecting unauthenticated users to the login screen.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the AccountScreen, showing either account info and logout button or redirecting to login if not authenticated.
